title: Notebook: Dauphiné’s Tour de France Lessons, Jorgenson’s Rising Stock, and Where’s GC Kuss?
content:
Tour de Hoody: How far can Roglič and Evenepoel go in the Tour de France? Derek Gee and his huge win, and Van Dijk's bad break.

Read the full article at Notebook: Dauphiné’s Tour de France Lessons, Jorgenson’s Rising Stock, and Where’s GC Kuss? on Velo.
author: ahood
